lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: As the team Ranchers helping Ranchers put it ranching and raising animals on small and family farms should be treasured and protected.  I am 5th generation (with 6th coming up) born & raised on a working cattle & sheep ranch.  I know how hard and rewarding a life on the land is and want to help support others doing the same in the developing world.
lenders.occupational_info:
In the 1870’s three ranchers (one being my great-great grandfather) married three sisters. From the first generation until today these families have maintained close social ties and helped with each others ranch work and supported each other in time of need. We currently graze cattle and in the past sheep.  When we had sheep, our sheepherders came from Peru & Mexico through a work exchange.  What they earned helping our family with the sheep would often support an entire village back home.  Eventfully we had to sell out of the sheep related to a declining meat & wool market.  There is also a lot of pressure to get grazing animals off public lands and we were in fear of losing our grazing allotment.  Kiva is a nice way to give back to the people we were once close to. 
As with most farming and ranching an outside income is often needed to secure the safety of the operation in bad years.  With this in mind I became a nurse and recently a Nurse Practitioner.  Rural healthcare both here in America and in the developing world is a passion of mine.  During my nurse practitioner training I was able to travel to Benin, West Africa, and spend time at The Songhai Center run by local people teaching sustainable agriculture and health care.  I worked on a project at the center to manufacture & sell at reasonable price ceramic water filters that families could have in their homes to allow for clean/safe drinking & cooking water.  I fell in love with the passion and closeness to the land the African people had and found that I often had more in common with them then most Americans.

Carrots are for rabbits. I and my team will provide great feeds.

lenders.name: Kris & Kim
lenders.loan_because: We want to see the world prosper. We wish for the end of suffering for all sentient beings. The only way that we can all prosper is if people of both genders are able to contribute to human betterment. We loan because we want people to realize their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info:
Kris supervises a small cafe inside of a bookstore. There are about seven workers that she supervises. I make sure that there are plenty of products to serve customers and keep them happy. Customer service is a big deal for Kris; she makes sure that we remember our regular customers by name, as well as the drink that they like. She cleans the cafe, orders supplies, trains new workers, and sets up nice-looking displays of products. 

Kim is currently managing the household, which consists of Kris, Kim, and Kim's parents John and Gail...as well as two cats. Kim does laundry, cooks great meals, cleans up the house, and has developed a compost thing to help make potable soil for a garden next spring. Nevada doesn't have the best soil; it's more like sand. So, Kim has used her expertise to develop this compost system to make soil in which our food will thrive and make us less-dependent on outside sources. We plan to launch our organic garden in early 2010.

lenders.name: Denver-Nairobi Sister Cities
lenders.loan_because:
Denver, Colorado and Nairobi, Kenya established a Sister Cities partnership on March 2, 1975.  The mission of Denver Sister Cities International is to promote peace through mutual respect, understanding and cooperation with cultural, educational and economic endeavors. Through more than 30 years, the Denver-Nairobi Committee has been dedicated to promoting economic achievements, cultural exchanges, and cross-cultural learning opportunities. 

The Denver-Nairobi Committee is excited and honored to be participating in micro-credit lending to individuals strengthening their lives and communities in Kenya.
lenders.occupational_info: Denver and Nairobi are both bustling modern capitols, with international air, diverse populations and nearby snow-topped peaks. Nairobi, like Denver, is situated on a high plateau with two of the highest peaks in Africa a relatively short distance away. Nairobi is an exciting and cosmopolitan city and, as the capitol of Kenya, serves as a center of commerce for all of East Africa. Like the "Queen City of the Plains," Nairobi is a beautiful city and has often been referred to as the "Jewel of Africa."

lenders.name: rebitinc
lenders.occupational_info:
Rebit’s award-winning backup and recovery software is so simple, it actually gets used.  Rebit provides complete and continuous backup of Windows-based computers.  No setup. No configuration.  No scheduling.  No buttons.  Unlike competing 

products that only copy data, Rebit also protects applications, individual settings, and the entire operating system.It even maintains multiple versions of files as they change.  In the event of a complete hard drive failure, a virus, or the accidental deletion of a file, Rebit provides painless recovery using the familiar “drag and drop” feature of Windows Explorer.

My father doesnt work anymore. i wish i could get some loans so i can live better than now.Thank You
lenders.occupational_info: I want a salon with full equipment. because i know i have a talent in it. i can do any style in hair cut and other treatment.

lenders.name: Rob
lenders.loan_because: "The world is like a ride in an amusement park, and when you choose to go on it you think it's real because that's how powerful our minds are. The ride goes up and down, around and around, it has thrills and chills, and it's very brightly coloured, and it's very loud, and it's fun for a while. Many people have been on the ride a long time, and they begin to wonder, 'Hey, is this real, or is this just a ride?' And other people have remembered, and they come back to us and say, 'Hey, don't worry; don't be afraid, ever. Because this is just a ride.' And we...kill those people. 'Shut him up! I've got a lot invested in this ride, shut him up! Look at my furrows of worry, look at my big bank account, and my family. This has to be real.' It's just a ride. But we always kill the good guys who try and tell us that, you ever notice that? And let the demons run amok? But it doesn't matter, because it's just a ride. And we can change it any time we want. It's only a choice. No effort, not work, no job, no savings of money. Just a simple choice, right now, between fear and love. The eyes of fear want you to put bigger locks on your doors, buy guns, close yourself off. The eyes of love instead see all of us as one. Here's what we can do to change the world, right now, to a better ride. Take all that money we spend on weapons and defences each year and instead spend it feeding and clothing and educating the poor of the world, which it would pay for many times over, not one human being excluded, and we could explore space, together, both inner and outer, forever, in peace."  - Bill Hicks.

lenders.name: Georgina
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back- I have had hard times and folks were there for me, now I can be there for others.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: God is good!
lenders.occupational_info: I lead a church to understand God's grace.

lenders.name: Gretchen
lenders.loan_because: The fastest way to spread prosperity around the globe is to give people the power to change thier own lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I joined the Coast Guard in the United States to protect and manage our natural resources and act as an instrument in one of the most critical elements in our democracy- The Rule of Law

lenders.name: Ethel
lenders.loan_because: I have way more of everything than I need and want to share with those who have little.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for peace and justice, which includes human rights --  employment, food, shelter, healthcare.

lenders.name: Jorge
lenders.loan_because: It's great to make a  difference for someone else, especially when it's so easy and we are able to...

lenders.name: Debbie
lenders.loan_because: we want to pay it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: I have two, school-age boys.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people and see them become successful.
lenders.occupational_info: I am someone that uses the internet to make a living and in helping others I build my business.

lenders.name: Elias
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves.

lenders.name: Mollie
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone's life.

lenders.name: Else
lenders.loan_because: I am happy and healthy and have no troubles about money and security. I want to support people over the world living under poor circumstances  to make a better living.

lenders.name: Ross
lenders.loan_because: capitalism works!!  "give a man a fish...teach him how to fish..."

lenders.name: Ann and Meg
lenders.loan_because: We are entrepreneurs too and want to support others in their exciting ventures.
lenders.occupational_info: We represent fine artists whom we know and appreciate, and sell their work in a comfortable, home-like environment in Atlanta, Georgia.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: We need to practice what we preach (or in this case, teach).

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed with many things and want to be a blessing to others (and Josh and Chuck made me).
lenders.occupational_info: I sit in front of a computer all day, doing nothing of any real relevance.

lenders.name: McCarthy Family
lenders.loan_because: We believe in the human spirit.  It is amazing that there are so many people with the drive, dream, and determination to be Entrepreneurs.  We are glad to help keep that dream alive.

lenders.name: JDK
lenders.loan_because: I believe in creating opportunity and sharing resources (both financial and intellectual) with anyone willing to risk it all to win.  I put my faith in those special people that find the courage to step out of the norm, those people who dream big things are possible and those people who are of the character to do the same for others when they are given the chance.
lenders.occupational_info: Every business I am involved in is a people business.  They are rooted in the belief that I can inspire, impress or transport my clients to another place by giving them a unique experience.  My hospitality interestes in Nightclubs, Lounges and Cocktail Bars are about delivering a product that people can connect to and identify with.

lenders.name: BCP Microfinance Club
lenders.loan_because: we as a club believe in the power of microfinance as a means of empowerment and inspiration; as well as a renewable means by which to bring about positive change in the lives of many around the world!
lenders.occupational_info: Making positive change in the world, one loan at a time!

lenders.name: Kristina
lenders.loan_because:
I can... People are wasteful in our society, and I can't lie, i'm one of them. 
I instead want to take what I can and help someone out. It's a small step, but a little bit can go a long way to help someone get their feet of the ground. I can sacrifice a latte or two in order to get a business or a farm set up somewhere across the world. 
I admire the ambition these individuals have and I’m grateful that to be able to support them.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an analyst for a sales & marketing team. Basically I run reports, graph trends, draw conclusions, and read a lot of news stories!

lenders.name: Jez
lenders.loan_because: I loan, because if I don't, the next Jim Henson might have to become an accountant.

lenders.name: Nicole And Elke
lenders.loan_because: My Mom introduced me to this, we believe in trying to help others and instead of waisting money Mom requested donating to Kiva as her Xmas present. Thought it was a wonderful idea. Now to spread the word to friends and family. Love to see it grow.
lenders.occupational_info: Mom is a stay home Mom on disibility.  I am a student and a volunteer for our community.

lenders.name: Bao
lenders.loan_because: it's all for one and one for all

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: This is awesome!  Reinvest people!!!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm going to school to study bankruptcy law.

lenders.name: Todd Newsom
lenders.loan_because: I want to honor God by helping those in need,
lenders.occupational_info: I help teenagers develop a growing relationship with Jesus Christ.

lenders.name: wendis
lenders.loan_because: me gustaria accesar a este programa
lenders.occupational_info: Estoy  comercializando productos naturales y desarrollando una red de mercadeo con afiliados, pero aun no hemos podido adquirir los productos por falta de recursos economicos

lenders.name: Jose
lenders.loan_because: I can and others need.
lenders.occupational_info: I write ads for TV, radio, print, etc.

lenders.name: Mary Jane
lenders.loan_because: KIVA gives me the chance to help people all over the world. I get a lot of joy from KIVA.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach Maths and Engineering at university. I love teaching.

lenders.name: AIESEC
lenders.loan_because: It helps make a better world

lenders.name: Roz
lenders.loan_because: I want to take direct action to help others.

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: it gives people a sense of pride and responsibility to better their lives and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a financial management office that helps people manage their money, and my husband is a children's music artist.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I like helping the world economy and people that need it.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with Technology & Computers.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.occupational_info:
Hello there! I'm a salon owner in Seattle, WA.  My family immigrated here in 1979.  

I believe creating a self sustaining business where profits can go directly to help families do the same through microloans is how I can change the world.

This is a small way I want to give back to mothers like mine.

lenders.name: Lietta
lenders.loan_because: I have always donated my time talent and/or treasure in small humble ways.  I have not (yet) been in the finanical position to donate large sums of money.  I got tired of waiting for the huge wealth to manifest in my life before giving more, and Kiva is a fantastic way to be able to personally contribute humbly, but still have a much larger community and global impact.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a small business owner and for many years I was a single parent.  I am now on my third business, and I know how hard it can be to generate the initial capital needed to get a new business off the ground and to keep it running successfully.  Sometimes we need a helping hand to ignite our dream.

lenders.name: Tyler
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those who are struggling.
lenders.occupational_info: I program control systems for commercial buildings

lenders.name: Giovana & Camila
lenders.whereabouts: Santo Angelo Rio Grande do Sul

lenders.name: Kerri
lenders.loan_because: It's transformational. Sharing God's blessings and spreading love changes hearts and lives forever.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: Their are few opportunities one can directly affect the life of another, providing capital for emerging communities is the perfect vehicle.
lenders.occupational_info: I invest my time and energy to the betterment of myself and others, currently still in school, I spend my time on managing a musical group, web/graphic design, management of our on campus gym, and I am a Finance/Economics double major.

lenders.name: Rally Point
lenders.loan_because: We love small business, and are blessed to have had the opportunity and support to follow our passions. We want to give back by supporting the entrepreneurial efforts of those who aren't as fortunate as us.
lenders.occupational_info: RallyPoint is a web service that helps small businesses recruit and manage the talent that make their business thrive. We pledge to loan 5% of all gross revenue to helping entrepreneurs around the world.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: it's enormously satisfying to help someone overcome the challenges of geography and circumstance.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide maintenance parts for large burner/boiler systems which are used for power generation

lenders.name: Sofia
lenders.loan_because: i think that people should have a reason to smile because they know i care

lenders.name: Logan
lenders.loan_because: I feel like my money will do more good by repeatedly lending to others then by just giving. Its a small gesture that can impact the life of someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm to young to work.

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: It connects me to people everywhere. With dozens of people scattered across the wealthy regions of the world lending resources to those with little to nothing, we can become the change we want to see in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently studying Biochemistry at Azusa Pacific University. I plan on attending medical school, working eventually toward a career in medicine. I have a long ways yet to go. . . .
